@itscarlylee Hi Carly, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear of your experience. Please feel free to DM us if you would like us to review some information. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

data.text: @addamsapple Thanks for contacting Allegiant! If you are experiencing issues, use a desktop/laptop and Google Chrome for your web browser. Make sure that you clear your cache and cookies too. If you are using the app, be sure to uninstall/reinstall. Hope this helps! -N

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @RockiaHarris We're so sorry for any frustrations. Please report your bag to our baggage team for assistance https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK. - GM
@deniro24 Hi there! If you need assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specific details of your request. - C

@BlueInFlorida76 We're sorry for any confusion. Our ticket counters close 45 minutes before departure, which means we won't accept bags after that time. If you have any questions, please send us a DM. - GM
@str333b We're sorry to hear that. If there is something we can help with, please send us a DM. - GM

@bobsherpowski Hi Bob! Our ticket counters will open two hours prior to departure to accept checked baggage, but not before then. Please keep in mind that the ticket counters will close promptly 45mins prior to departure. - C
@MimiRankin Hi Mimi! Please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that a member of our team can troubleshoot with you. - C
@RyleaRose13 Hi there! Please direct any and all communication regarding disability accommodations to our ACAA Department at: acaa@allegiantair.com - C
@AndyBluestars Hi Andy! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@jlazzthedon We're sorry to hear it. Please send us a DM if you need assistance. - GM

data.text: @bakerman59 Hi Brian! A musical instrument may be brought on board as a carry-on, as long as it can be safely stowed in the overhead bin and space is available when you board. If an instrument can't fit in the overhead bin and a seat is not purchased for it, it will be checked. - C
@Nicmedia123 We are still waiting for you to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC 🙂
@giai05 Please feel free to send us a Direct Message. -SW
@TayTraveler1990 Hi Rachel! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the Passenger's information and the flight information, so that we may search our records for you. - C
@jennmann9 Hi Jen! If you are having issues booking on our official website, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that a member of our team can troubleshoot with you. - C
@carjrocq Hi Carly! The expiration date of any Allegiant voucher is the date by which travel must be completed, it is not a book-by date. - C

@SeanClayton79 Hi Sean! Thanks for reaching out with this question. Allegiant offers nonstop flights at low fares. We are a non-connecting airline. This means that our operations are not designed to accommodate same-day transfers from one flight to another. - C

Yesterday, we celebrated the opening of our new base at @AUStinAirport by kicking off nonstop service to NINE new cities! This $75 million base is now home to three A320s and our first Austin-based team of pilots, flight attendants, maintenance techs and ground support staff. https://t.co/SYM0jDzU7I
@Nicmedia123 Please feel free to send us a Direct Message. -SW

urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

urls.title: Transportation Security Administration | Transportation Security Administration
urls.description: The .gov means it’s official. Federal government websites often end in .gov or .mil. Before sharing sensitive information, make sure you’re on a federal government site. The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely. Now you can add your Colorado driver's license or state ID to Apple Wallet on iPhone or Apple Watch. The TSA PreCheck® current enrollment provider, IDEMIA, has reduced the enrollment and in-person

The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely.
